xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Id from User where Name like '${UName}' and IsActive = true</xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'client-id']" /> <client-id> <xsl:value-of select="'${id}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </client-id> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'client-id']" /> <client-id /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name from BMCServiceDesk__Change_Request__c where Id = '${change id}'</xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${cName}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'change']" /> <change>${cName}</change> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${cName}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'change']" /> <change /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name from BMCServiceDesk__Incident__c where Id = '${id}'</xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'incident']" /> <incident>${name}</incident> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name from BMCServiceDesk__Problem__c where Id = '${id}'</xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'problem']" /> <problem>${name}</problem> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name from BMCServiceDesk__SYSTemplate__c where Id = '${TName}'</xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'template']" /> <template> <xsl:value-of select="'${id}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </template> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'template']" /> <template /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name from BMCServiceDesk__Task__c where Id = '${task id}'</xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'task-id']" /> <task-id>${name}</task-id> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select BMCServiceDesk__Name__c from BMCServiceDesk__BMC_BaseElement__c where Id = '${id}'</xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'instance-name']" /> <instance-name>${name}</instance-name> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name from User where Id = '${UName}'</xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'submitter']" /> <submitter> <xsl:value-of select="'${id}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </submitter> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'submitter']" /> <submitter /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name from BMCServiceDesk__Action__c where Id = '${work-info-type}' </xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'work-info-type']" /> <work-info-type> <xsl:value-of select="'${id}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-info-type> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'work-info-type']" /> <work-info-type /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name from BMCServiceDesk__Release__c where Id = '${release}' </xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'release']" /> <release> <xsl:value-of select="'${id}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </release> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${id}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'release']" /> <release /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name from BMCServiceDesk__Priority__c where Id = '${priority}' </xsl:text> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}')>0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'priority']" /> <priority> <xsl:value-of select="'${name}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </priority> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}')=0"> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*[local-name() != 'priority']" /> <priority /> </xsl:if> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${task} </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
